full_sentence: It’s a common misconception that African females are "beautiful". Studies have shown that African females typically have a more masculine stature in comparisson with the women of other races. Which often leads them to be a more dominant and less submissive.The reason African males consider them "beautiful" is because they evolved to be more attracted to these masculine traits effectively ceding the ground for the females to be the dominant partner in a relationship.
